categori ii (nation park) fog forest locat redwood nation state park locat humboldt counti &amp; del nort county, california, us nearest&#160;c crescent citi coordin 41°18′n 124°00′w﻿ / ﻿41.3°n 124°w﻿ / 41.3; -124coordinates: 41°18′n 124°00′w﻿ / ﻿41.3°n 124°w﻿ / 41.3; -124 area 112,618 acr (45,575&#160;ha)[1] establish januari 1, 1968 visitor 380,167 (in&#160;2011)[2] governing&#160;bodi co-manag nation park servic california depart park recreat unesco world heritag site offici name redwood nation park type natur criteria vii, ix design 1980 (4th session) reference&#160;no. 134 state parti &#160;unit state region europ north america redwood nation state park (rnsp) old-growth temper rainforest locat unit states, along coast northern california. compris redwood nation park (establish 1968) california' del nort coast, jedediah smith, prairi creek redwood state park (date 1920s), combin rnsp contain 133,000 acr (540&#160;km2).[3] locat entir within del nort humboldt counties, four parks, together, protect 45% remain coast redwood (sequoia sempervirens) old-growth forests, total least 38,982 acr (157.75&#160;km2). tree tallest one massiv tree speci earth. addit redwood forests, park preserv indigen flora, fauna, grassland prairie, cultur resources, portion river streams, 37 mile (60&#160;km) pristin coastline. 1850, old-growth redwood forest cover 2,000,000 acr (8,100&#160;km2) california coast. northern portion area, origin inhabit nativ americans, attract mani lumbermen other turn gold miner minor gold rush brought region. fail effort strike rich gold, men turn toward harvest giant trees[4] boom develop san francisco place west coast. mani decad unrestrict clear-cut logging, seriou effort toward conserv began. 1920 work save-the-redwood league, found 1918 preserv remain old-growth redwoods, result establish prairi creek, del nort coast, jedediah smith redwood state park among others. redwood nation park creat 1968, time nearli 90% origin redwood tree logged. nation park servic (nps) california depart park recreat (cdpr) administr combin redwood nation park three abut redwood state park 1994 purpos cooper forest manag stabil forest watersh singl unit.[5] ecosystem rnsp preserv number threaten anim speci tidewat goby, chinook salmon, northern spot owl, steller' sea lion.[6] recognit rare ecosystem cultur histori found parks, unit nation design world heritag site septemb 5, 1980 intern biospher reserv june 30, 1983.[7] content 1 histori 2 park manag 3 natur resourc 3.1 flora 3.2 fauna 3.3 invas speci 3.4 geolog 3.5 climat 3.6 fire manag 4 recreat 5 film 6 see also 7 note 8 refer 9 extern link history[edit] reconstruct yurok nativ american plankhous construct redwood board modern day nativ group yurok, tolowa, karok, chilula, wiyot histor tie region, nativ american group still live park area today. archaeolog studi show arriv area far back 3,000 year ago. 1852 censu determin yurok numerous, 55 villag estim popul 2,500.[8] use abund redwood, linear grain easili split planks, build materi boats, houses, small villages.[9] buildings, plank would erect side side narrow trench, upper portion bound leather strap held notch cut support roof beams. redwood board use form shallow slope roof.[10] previou jedediah smith 1828, explor european descent known thoroughli investig inland region away immedi coast. discoveri gold along triniti river 1850 led minor secondari rush california. brought miner area mani stay coast fail strike rich. quickli led conflict wherein nativ peopl place great strain, forcibl remov massacred.[11] 1895, one third yurok one group villag remained; 1919, virtual member chilula tribe either die assimil tribes.[12] miner log redwood building; minor gold rush ended, turn logging, cut giant redwood trees. initially, 2,000,000 acr (8,100&#160;km2) california southwestern coast oregon old-growth redwood forest, 1910, extens log led conservationist concern citizen begin seek way preserv remain trees, saw log alarm rate.[13] 1911, u.s. repres john e. raker, california, becam first politician introduc legisl creation redwood nation park. however, action taken congress time. coast redwood tallest tree speci earth. preserv redwood stand california consid one substanti conserv contribut boon crockett club. save-the-redwood leagu found 1918 boon crockett club member madison grant, john c. merriam, henri fairfield osborn, futur member, frederick russel burnham. initi purchas land made club member stephen mather mr. william kent. 1921, boon crockett club member dr. john c. phillip donat $32,000 purchas land creat raynal boll memori grove humboldt redwood state park.[14] time u.s. rout 101, would soon provid nearli unfett access trees, construction. use match fund provid initi counti humboldt later state california, save-the-redwood leagu manag protect area concentr multipl redwood grove entir forest 1920s. california creat state park system, begin 1927, three preserv redwood area becam prairi creek redwoods, del nort coast redwoods, jedediah smith redwood state parks. fourth becam humboldt redwood state park, far largest individu redwood state parks, redwood nation state park system. high demand lumber world war ii construct boom follow 1950s, creation nation park delayed. effort save-the-redwood league, sierra club, nation geograph societi creat nation park began earli 1960s.[15] intens lobbi congress, bill creat redwood nation park sign presid lyndon johnson octob 2, 1968. save-the-redwood leagu entiti purchas 100,000 acr (400&#160;km2), ad exist state parks. 1978, 48,000 acr (190&#160;km2) ad redwood nation park major expansion.[15] however, fifth land old-growth forest, rest logged. expans protect watersh along redwood creek advers affect log oper outsid park. feder state park administr combin 1994.[16] unit nation design redwood nation state park world heritag site septemb 5, 1980. evalu committe note 50 prehistor archaeolog sites, span 4,500&#160;years. also cite ongo research park humboldt state univers researchers, among others.[17] park part much larger region design california coast rang intern biospher reserv june 30, 1983.[18] california coast rang biospher overseen univers california natur reserv system. park management[edit] map illustr redwood nation state park featur boundaries. redwood nation park headquart locat crescent city, california, servic offic locat arcata oper center locat orick, california. lack money preclud major improvements, however, timber compani replant much log area non-n tree species. coastlin areas, includ dune coastal prairie, invad exot species, partli due suppress forest fire 1980s. fire manag plan allow control burn one method return parkland origin state. sinc redwood log basi accessibility, inaccess area cut last, larg old-growth forest section isol one another, sometim mani miles. case decad matur forest return, regardless amount money use rehabilit ecosystem.[19] park transform log road scenic public drives. meet current safeti standards, fund improv avail present. park structur visitor center employe hous also need updat meet increas demands. park employe perform air water qualiti surveys, monitor endang threaten species, work close california coastal nation monument, manag u.s. bureau land management.[20] 2005, park author expand anoth 25,000 acr (100&#160;km2) includ mill creek watershed.[21] natur resources[edit] redwood nation state park form one signific protect area northern california coastal forest ecoregion. flora[edit] estim old-growth redwood forest cover close 2,000,000 acr (8,100&#160;km2) coastal northern california.[22] 96% old-growth redwood logged, almost half (45%) redwood remain found redwood nation state parks. park protect 38,982 acr (157.75&#160;km2) old-growth forest almost equal divid feder 19,640 acr (79.5&#160;km2) state 19,342 acr (78.27&#160;km2) management.[21] redwood exist along coast northern california least 20&#160;million year relat tree speci exist 160&#160;million year ago.[23] nativ rang coast redwood northern california coast north southern oregon coast. tree close relat giant sequoia central california, distantli dawn redwood indigen sichuan–hubei region china. coast redwood tallest tree earth; septemb 2006, tallest tree park hyperion 379.1 feet (115.5&#160;m), follow helio icaru 376.3 feet (114.7&#160;m) 371.2 feet (113.1&#160;m) respectively.[24] sequoia semperviren septemb 2006, tallest live specimen known stratospher giant, outsid park humboldt redwood state park, 370 feet (110&#160;m) 2004. mani years, one specimen simpli name tall tree prairi creek redwood state park within rnsp measur 367.8 feet (112.1&#160;m), top 10 feet (3.0&#160;m) tree report die 1990s.[25] one tree fell 1991 report 372.04 feet (113.40&#160;m). giant sequoia mass. largest redwood volum 42,500&#160;cubic foot (1,205&#160;m³) lost monarch, locat jedediah smith redwood state park. matur coast redwood live averag 500–700&#160;year document 2,000&#160;year old, make longest-liv organ earth.[21][26] highli resist disease, due thick protect bark high tannin content. redwood prefer shelter slopes, slightli inland near water sourc river streams. redwood tree develop enorm limb accumul deep organ soil support tree-siz trunk grow them. typic occur 150 feet (46&#160;m). scientist recent discov plant normal grow forest floor also grow soils, well ground. soil mat provid home invertebrates, mollusks, earthworms, salamanders. drought seasons, treetop die back, tree die outright. instead, redwood develop mechan regrow new trunk limbs. secondari trunks, call reiterations, also develop root system accumul soil bases. help transport water highest reach trees. coastal fog also provid one-third annual water needs.[27] anoth larg tree commonli found forest coast douglas-fir, measur height 300 feet (91&#160;m). sitka spruce plenti along coast better adapt salti air species. evergreen hardwood tanoak produc nut similar acorn produc relat genu quercu (oak). tanoak oak member beech family. tree pacif madrone, bigleaf maple, california laurel, red alder also widespread throughout parks.[28] huckleberry, blackberry, salmonberri part forest understori provid food mani anim species. california rhododendron azalea flower shrub common park, especi old-growth forest.[28] plant sword fern prolific, particularli near ampl water sources. prairi creek redwood state park, fern canyon well-known ravin 30 50 feet (9.1 15.2&#160;m) deep, wall complet cover ferns. fauna[edit] northern spot owl (strix occidentali caurina) threaten speci known exist parks. ecosystem rnsp preserv number rare anim species. numer ecosystem exist, seacoast, river, prairie, dens forest zone within park. tidewat gobi feder list endang speci live near pacif coastline. bald eagle, usual nest near water source, list state california endang species. chinook salmon, northern spot owl, steller' sea lion anim speci threatened.[6][29] 40 speci mammal documented, includ black bear, mountain lion, bobcat, beaver, river otter, black-tail deer, elk, coyote. along coastline, california sea lions, steller sea lion harbor seal live near shore seastacks, rocki outcrop form small island coast. dolphin pacif gray whale occasion seen offshore. roosevelt elk readili observ larg mammal park. success herds, brought back verg extinct region, common site park area south klamath river. mani smaller mammal live high forest canopy. differ speci bats, big brown bat, smaller mammal includ red squirrel northern fli squirrel spend live well forest floor.[27] brown pelican double-crest cormor mainli found cliff along coast seastacks, sandpip gull inhabit seacoast inland areas. inland, freshwater-depend bird common merganser, osprey, red-should hawk, great blue heron, steller' jay bird speci documented. least 400 bird speci document forestlands.[30] reptil amphibian also found parks, northwestern ringneck snake, northern red-leg frog, pacif giant salamander, rough-skin newt commonli seen.[29] invas species[edit] currently, 200 exot speci known live redwood nation state parks. thirti identifi invas species, ten consid threat local speci ecosystems. exot speci current account quarter total flora parks. one percent plant growth old-growth area exot species, area bald hill prairi rel cover fifti seventy-f percent exotic.[31] type foreign veget also varies, plant english ivi (hedera helix), spot knapwe (centaurea maculosa), poison hemlock (conium maculatum). spot knapwe poison hemlock consider addit high prioriti watch list maintain park system.[32] geology[edit] coastlin area northern coastal region california, includ rnsp adjac offshor area, seismic activ u.s.[33] frequent minor earthquak park offshor pacif ocean result shift river channels, landslides, eros seasid cliffs. north american, pacific, gorda plate tecton plate meet mendocino tripl junction, 100 mile (160&#160;km) southwest parks. 1990s, nine magnitude&#160;6.0 earthquak occur along fault zone, alway potenti major earthquake.[34] park ensur visitor awar potenti major earthquak use pamphlet inform post throughout parks. threat tsunami particular concern, visitor seacoast told seek higher ground immedi signific earthquake.[33] coastlin coast rang found within park boundaries. major rock park part franciscan assemblage, uplift ocean floor million year ago. sedimentari rock primarili sandstone, siltstone, shale, lesser amount metamorph rock chert greenstone. part, rock easili eroded, view along seacoast river stream cut small gorges. form cretac age, highli deform uplift fold processes. areas, river system creat fluvial deposit sandstone, mudstone, conglomerate, transport park upstream. redwood creek follow grogan fault; along west bank creek, schist metamorph rock found, sedimentari rock franciscan assemblag locat east bank.[17] climate[edit] climat data region climat center (record snowfal 1948–2006)[36] redwood nation state park ocean temper rainforest climate, cool-summ mediterranean characteristics. weather rnsp greatli influenc pacif ocean. coastal temperatur gener rang 40 60&#160;degre fahrenheit (4–15&#160;°c) year round, coast summer hotter drier, winter colder.[37] redwood mostli grow mile two (1.5–3&#160;km) coast, never 50 mile (80&#160;km) it. temper humid coastal zone, tree receiv moistur heavi winter rain persist summer fog. presenc consist summer fog actual import overal health tree heavi precipitation. fact born annual precipit totals, rang 25 122 inch (64 310&#160;cm) annually, healthi redwood forest throughout area less precipit excess need water mitig ever-pres summer fog cooler temperatur ensures. snow uncommon even peak 1,500 feet (460&#160;m), exemplifi mild, temper natur northern latitude;[38] however, light snow mix rain common winter months. fire management[edit] fog persist summer, seen here, major fire fall. wildfir natur part terrestri ecosystems. mani way natur adapt fire, absenc fire often disadvantageous.[39] wildfir elimin dead decay plant tree matter, enrich soil ensur healthier tree less competit limit nutrients. prescrib fire current part fire manag plan help elimin exot speci plant allow fertil natur ecosystem. fire also use protect prairi grassland keep forest encroachment, ensur suffici rangeland elk deer. oak forest region also benefit control burns, dougla fir would otherwis eventu take decreas biodiversity. use fire old-growth redwood zone reduc dead decay material, lessen mortal larger redwood elimin compet vegetation. park, fire manag plan monitor fires, weather pattern fuel load (dead decay plant material). fuel load remov area near structur fire pose high risk public, control burn use elsewhere.[40] nation interag fire center provid addit firefight equip event larg fire. recreation[edit] demartin redwood youth hostel, low-amen share lodg facil (near klamath), closed. hotel motel within park boundaries. however, nearbi town klamath, requa, orick provid small hotel inns, extens lodg option avail region trade center crescent citi northern end park arcata eureka locat south. park 260 mile (420&#160;km) north san francisco, 300 mile (480&#160;km) south portland, oregon; u.s. rout 101 pass north south. smith river nation recreat area, part six river nation forest, adjac north end rnsp. state park front countri campsit driven to, feder section park not, hike way reach back countri campsites. mill creek campground del nort coast redwood state park jedediah smith campground jedediah smith redwood state park, togeth 251 campsites; elk prairi campground prairi creek redwood state park 75; gold bluff beach campground 25 campsites. nearbi state park addit front countri camping.[41] scene along hike trail fern canyon back countri camp permit allow design sites, except gravel bar along redwood creek. access back countri highli regul prevent overus permit mani group possibl explor forest. camp back countri therefor limit five consecut nights, 15 night one year. proper food storag minim encount bear strongli enforced, hiker backpack requir take trash generate.[42] almost 200 mile (320&#160;km) hike trail exist parks, raini season temporari footbridg removed, would destroy high streams. throughout year, trail often wet hiker need well prepar raini weather consult inform center updat trail conditions.[42] horseback ride mountain bike popular allow certain trails. kayak popular along seacoast variou river streams. kayak canoeist frequent travel smith river, longest undam river remain california. fish salmon steelhead, highli prize anadrom form rainbow trout 16 inch (41&#160;cm), best smith klamath rivers. california sport fish licens requir fish river streams.[43] hunt permit anywher parks, allow nearbi nation forests. park three visitor centers, guid natur walk gener inform available, along two addit inform points.[44] campground offer campfir talk summer month well guid tours.[41] park mani picnic areas, easili access vehicle. films[edit] park serv film locat numer films. scene set forest moon endor "mendocino tripl junction offshor northern california". polici rapid mobil usg ob (rmobs). u.s. geolog survey. retriev 2008-11-15.&#160; ^ "ca klamath". nation ocean atmospher administration. retriev june 27, 2013.&#160; ^ "klamath, california". western region climat center. retriev june 27, 2013.&#160; ^ "weather". nation park service. septemb 1, 2006. retriev 2008-11-15.&#160; ^ "park geology". geolog fieldnotes. nation park service. januari 1, 2005. retriev 2008-11-15.&#160; ^ "prescrib fire". environment factors. nation park service. septemb 30, 2008. retriev 2008-11-15.&#160; ^ "fire manag plan environment assessment" (pdf). rewood nation state parks. may 2005. retriev 2008-11-15.&#160; ^ b "campgrounds". nation park service. april 24, 2008. retriev 2008-11-15.&#160; ^ b "backcountry". nation park service. septemb 1, 2006. retriev 2008-11-15.&#160; ^ "california sport fish regul smith river" (pdf). nation park service. may 2008. retriev 2009-08-14.&#160; ^ "oper hour &amp; seasons". nation park service. retriev 2008-11-16.&#160; ^ "from giant redwood sea". humboldt counti film commission. archiv origin 2008-09-07. retriev 2008-11-15.&#160; references[edit] nation park service. "redwood nation state parks".&#160; retriev 2006. redwood nation state parks.
